posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone-

I have three cards I am looking to sell. They don’t fit in with what I am doing, and if the time comes, no regret letting them go. I don’t know how to download from my IPad the pictures, so any help or input would be well received.

I have the following for sale-

SOLD******Roger Bresnahan Batting-Sweet Caporal 350/30, probably a 1. Asking $65 for it
Lots of color, and nothing that would take away from the front overall.

SOLD*******John McGraw Glove at Hip-Sweet Caporal 350-460/42, probably a 1. Asking $65 for it. One crease across the top third, doesn’t take away from the card though.

SOLD********“Iron Man” Joe McGinnity-Sweet Caporal 350/30. EASILY A 2, no creases, color is really good. Asking $85 for it.

Not making any money off these three cards, just want to use the cash to get other cards I am after or find. Feel free to email me anytime at 

[url]Jamesmckee2018@gmail.com[/url]

I have no problem emailing pictures back, probably don’t want to budge from asking price either, unless there is a compelling trade offer (portraits only). I will ship FedEx Ground as well. Payment method is PayPal F/F or Venmo. Nothing else.

Thank You,
James
A raw Tinker portrait that would be considered a 1or 2 will get all three cards.
Alright, that was fast. All three are sold!!!!!  Thank you to the buyers!
